[console_scripts]
odd=odd.main:main

[odd.artifact]
addon=odd.artifact:Addon
addon_path=odd.artifact:AddonPath
csv_row=odd.artifact:CSVRow
data_file=odd.artifact:DataFile
demo_file=odd.artifact:DemoFile

issue=odd.artifact:Issue
model_definition=odd.artifact:ModelDefinition
model_method=odd.artifact:ModelMethod
python_module=odd.artifact:PythonModule
xml_document=odd.artifact:XMLDocument
xml_record=odd.artifact:XMLRecord

[odd.plugin]
addon_path_emitter=odd.plugin:AddonPathEmitter
csv_row_emitter=odd.plugin:CSVRowEmitter

demo_file_emitter=odd.plugin:DemoFileEmitter
external_id_emitter=odd.plugin:ExternalIDEmitter
field_definition_emitter=odd.plugin:FieldDefinitionEmitter
model_definition_emitter=odd.plugin:ModelDefinitionEmitter
model_method_emitter=odd.plugin:ModelMethodEmitter
